mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MU_REVIEW ( REV_IDX, REV_CATEGORY, REV_WRITER, REV_SUBJECT, REV_CONTENT, REV_WRITE_DATE, REV_FILE_NAME, REV_ORI_NAME, REV_HIT ) VALUES ( MU_REV_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{rev_category}, #{rev_writer}, #{rev_subject}, #{rev_content}, SYSDATE, #{rev_file_name}, #{rev_ori_name}, 0 )
mapper.select: SELECT RR.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RN, R.* FROM ( SELECT * FROM MU_REVIEW WHERE REV_DEL_STATUS IS NULL ORDER BY REV_WRITE_DATE DESC ) R ) RR WHERE RN = 1
SELECT COUNT(REV_IDX) FROM MU_REVIEW WHERE REV_DEL_STATUS IS NULL ORDER BY REV_IDX DESC

SELECT RRR.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RN, RR.* FROM ( SELECT R.REV_IDX REV_IDX, REV_CATEGORY, REV_SUBJECT, C.CNT COMM_CNT, REV_WRITER, REV_WRITE_DATE, REV_HIT, MEM_NAME FROM MU_REVIEW R LEFT JOIN ( SELECT REV_IDX, COUNT(RCOM_IDX) CNT FROM MU_REV_COMMENT GROUP BY REV_IDX ) C ON R.REV_IDX = C.REV_IDX LEFT JOIN MU_MEMBER M ON (R.REV_WRITER = M.MEM_ID) WHERE R.REV_DEL_STATUS IS NULL ORDER BY R.REV_WRITE_DATE DESC ) RR ) RRR WHERE RN BETWEEN #{begin} AND #{end}
SELECT M.MEM_NAME MEM_NAME, R.* FROM MU_REVIEW R JOIN MU_MEMBER M ON R.REV_WRITER = M.MEM_ID WHERE REV_IDX = #{rev_idx}
mapper.update: UPDATE MU_REVIEW SET REV_CATEGORY = #{rev_category}, REV_SUBJECT = #{rev_subject}, REV_FILE_NAME = #{rev_file_name}, REV_ORI_NAME = #{rev_ori_name}, REV_CONTENT = #{rev_content} WHERE REV_IDX = #{rev_idx}
